name: Horror
description: Games designed to scare and thrill players.

name: Action
description: Fast-paced games focusing on physical challenges.

name: Adventure
description: Games with exploration and story-driven elements.

name: RPG
description: Role-playing games where players control characters in a fictional setting.

name: Strategy
description: Games that require careful planning and tactics.

name: Puzzle
description: Games focused on problem-solving and logic challenges.

name: Simulation
description: Games that mimic real-life activities.

name: Sports
description: Games that simulate real-world sports.

name: Fighting
description: Games that focus on close combat between characters.

name: Racing
description: Games where players compete in races.

name: Sandbox
description: Games that allow players to create, modify, or destroy their environment.

name: Arcade
description: Fast-paced games with simple controls.

name: Shooter
description: Games that focus on ranged combat with guns or projectiles.

name: Stealth
description: Games where players must avoid detection.

name: Tower Defense
description: Games where players defend their base by placing obstacles.

name: Music
description: Games that focus on music and rhythm.

name: Platformer
description: Games focused on jumping and climbing to reach objectives.

name: Survival
description: Games where players must survive hostile environments.

name: Visual Novel
description: Interactive games that focus on storytelling.

name: Battle Royale
description: Multiplayer games where players compete until only one remains.
